channel.title: Not asking for ban appeal just wondering
channel.description:
I was just checking one of my many banned accounts and this is odd.. never had this before Has anyone ever got this??
it says
Offence Date Offence Type Appeal Status Legacy Punishment Not Appealable
not why would it says not appealable if I never appealed before on this account and im not that good with this english word it says "legacy" which I guess means obsolete ?
Well I dont need advise to getting it unbanned had nothing but a disk of return probbly still stuck in the blackhole. Just wondering if anyone got this before? :|

i have one it basically means that it was before june. That when mine was anyway

Legacy means obsolete, or longstanding.

I was just checking one of my many banned accounts and this is odd… never had this before
